content:
I'm familiar with some of those authors, but I haven't read all of their works. I think I'll start with "The Brief Wondrous Life of Oscar Wao" since I've been meaning to read it for a while now. I've heard great things about Junot Díaz's writing style and the way he weaves together different narratives.

By the way, I've been thinking about starting a book journal to keep track of all the books I've read and the authors I've met. Do you have any tips on how to get started with that? I feel like it would be a great way to reflect on my reading journey and remember the fascinating people I've met along the way.
